attributes.action: Remove second home allowances for MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Members of Parliament receive good salaries and allowances. Those who have thier home within 50 miles of London's boundaries by road or rail should not have an allowance for a second home, either to rent or buy.

The MP's allowances system should be amended to reflect the travel circumstances most other people accept as part of thier travel to work arrangements.
